title: UCLA Health notifying patients of stolen laptop containing personal health information (UCLA Health System)
text: ( Source : UCLA Health System ) UCLA Health notifying patients of stolen laptop containing personal health information ( Note to editors: No spokespersons are available for interviews.) UCLA Health is sending notification letters to 1,242
